features.title: Preamplifier Function

features.title: Sound Master Tuned
features.description: MODEL10 retains the sonic Marantz signatures of warmth, spaciousness, and resolution. However, advances in design and precise tuning by the Sound Master result in the purest expression of the Marantz sound ever. As a result, the listener experiences more detail, lower distortion, and higher dynamic range than ever before.

features.title: Iconic Details Reimagined for Tomorrow
features.description: Designed with a brushed aluminum front, MODEL 10 is encased in a copper-plated, triple-layered chassis with illuminated mesh cover grille. Lighting inside the amplifier showcases the circuit boards, high-quality components, and specially designed transformer case. In a nod to the Marantz design DNA, MODEL10’s porthole houses a HD TFT Color Display for volume and input selection, along with a digital level meter that behaves like vintage analog meters.

features.title: Crafted in Shirakawa
features.description: MODEL 10 was conceived and engineered in our facilities in Shirakawa, Japan to deliver the highest performance.

tagline: Reference Integrated Stereo Amplifier with 200W and Custom HDAM

features.title: Optimized Design
features.description: To achieve such high quality, while still delivering class-leading power, means optimizing each section of the amplifier for its task, just as would be done in a design using a separate preamplifier and monoblock power amps.

features.title: Pure Marantz Sound
features.description: HDAM technology combined with optimized circuit design layout and carefully selected components, it provides exceptional sound quality and performance.

features.title: Sound Master Tuned
features.description: The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned PM-10 for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

features.title: Pure Analog
features.description: An important part of noise-reduction is the fact that the PM-10 is a purely analog amplifier: Marantz keeps things as clean and simple as possible with its highly-developed all-analog design.

features.title: Built to Perform
features.description: Like the partnering SA-10 Super Audio CD/CD player/DAC, the PM-10 is constructed to the highest possible standards, with a double-layered copper-plated chassis for excellent rejection of mechanical and electrical interference, and casework constructed from thick, heavy, non-magnetic aluminum panels. features.title: It Starts with the Disc

features.title: The Best of the Best
features.description: From the triple-layer aluminum chassis with copper plating to entirely original multi-layer PCBs, isolated sub-enclosures and HDAM modules, LINK 10n is the product of decades of expertise in audio engineering. It sets a new benchmark with meticulous construction, state-of-the art technologies, and elegant design.

features.title: Sound Master Tuned
features.description: As the flagship digital player in the Marantz portfolio, LINK 10n features the best measured performance of any digital product we’ve ever produced. Through extensive and careful listening, the Sound Master has selected numerous premium parts to be included in key circuits that elevate audible performance to a new standard of excellence.

features.title: Intuitive Display
features.description: LINK 10n comes with a large high-resolution full-color display for a beautiful user interface and intuitive operation. Familiar arrow buttons make navigation effortless. Scroll to select your desired input and see source, track info, and play mode displayed on the screen, or enjoy easy HEOS onboarding and access to the app via a QR code.

features.title: Marantz Industrial Design
features.description: Machined and brushed aluminum control surface, sculpted backshell, spun knobs, and high-resolution full color display are each striking features of 10 Series components. The design is both distinctively Marantz, drawing inspiration from classic models, and progressively modern.

features.title: Preamplifier Function
features.description: LINK 10n can act as a complete preamplifier front-end for your system, with all the functions of a modern high-end stereo system. Complete with single ended and balanced analog inputs, digital inputs, and a Marantz Premium Phono EQ supporting both MM and MC cartridges, it is also a fully featured front end for even the highest performance stereo systems.

features.title: Classic Marantz Design
features.description: Every Marantz product displays exquisite craftsmanship and acoustic excellence that represents our heritage, craftsmanship and relentless pursuit of audio excellence.

features.title: Premium, Power Performing Amplification
features.description: Delivers a masterful 140W per channel (8 ohms, 20Hz-20kHz, THD: 0.05%, 2 ch. driven) so you experience your entertainment in remarkable detail with all of today's most demanding content.

features.title: Sound Master Tuned
features.description: Extensively tuned by Marantz sound masters at the most state-of-the-art facilities to deliver an exquisite sonic signature. No component leaves the hands of Marantz sound masters until it passes rigorous testing. Envelop yourself with the most musical sound, from any source.

features.title: The Most Advanced Object-Based Audio Formats
features.description: Experience 3D audio that completely envelops you in all of your entertainment. Hear the jet booming overhead, the high speed car chase rush past you, and surround yourself in the downpouring thunderstorm from your all favorites with the latest surround formats, including Dolby Atmos®, Dolby Atmos Height Virtualization Technology, DTS:X®, DTS Virtual:X™, DTS:X® Pro, IMAX® Enhanced and Auro-3D®.

features.title: 8K Or 4K/120Hz For The Latest Entertainment Needs
features.description: With the latest technology in HDMI support, enjoy 8K quality video from all your 8K source devices. Showcasing one dedicated 8K input and two outputs, enjoy 8K/60Hz or 4K/120Hz pass-through in amazing clarity. 8K upscaling is available on all eight HDMI ports.

features.title: Slim and Elegant Design
features.description: Marantz design is timelessly elegant—an expression of the musical soundscapes the products create. Our philosophy of balance and symmetry is evident in our sound and our designs. Meticulously engineered in a compact chassis, STEREO 70s fits where standard equipment cannot.

features.title: High Resolution Audio
features.description: Carefully engineered with specially chosen components, STEREO 70s unveils the natural immersiveness and power of sound. Crystal clear digital decoding of up to 192 kHz 24-bit audio and DSD opens a new world of high resolution music with depth, breadth, and clarity not available with lossy files.

features.title: Sound Master Tuned
features.description: The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned STEREO 70s for amazing performance with careful parts selection to create the Most Musical Sound in your home.

features.title: Home Cinema from Only Two Channels
features.description: STEREO 70s merges the flexibility and features found in our CINEMA Series AVRs into a slim and simple 2 channel receiver. 8K HDMI plus ARC facilitates connection of smart TVs, game consoles and streaming systems. On screen display uses your TV screen to assist with setup. Support for up to 2 subwoofers means plenty of deep bass even when using small bookshelf speakers.
